text: ==First round== |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Second round== |} \---- \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Third round== 3 groups of 2 teams each. Winners qualify for the Final Tournament. |} Nigeria won 3–2 and qualified for the 1976 Summer Olympics football tournament. \---- Ghana won 2–1 and qualified for the 1976 Summer Olympics football tournament. \---- Zambia won 5–4 on penalties after 2–2 on aggregates and qualified for the 1976 Summer Olympics football tournament. ==Boycott== The three African participants withdrew a day before the start of the Games and were not replaced. They boycotted the Olympics protesting the participation of New Zealand, whose rugby team planned a summer tour of South Africa in spite of the Soweto uprising.http://www.rsssf.com/tableso/ol1976q.html#Africa == References == Category:Football qualification for the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Football at the Summer Olympics – Men's African Qualifiers
title: Football at the 1976 Summer Olympics – Men's African Qualifiers
